contents.item: graphics_driver.c This file holds the X11-dependent low-level driver-funtions of graphics.library.
graphics_internal.h Here is the definition of the driver-internal data structure which is stored in RastPort-longreserved[0].
intuition_driver.c This file holds the X11-dependent low-level driver-functions of intuition.library.
mmakefile.src This is the mmakefile source for config/x11.
